Detailed Description

Hierarchical header view for QTableView.

Header data is described by QAbstractItemModel. Table model's function "data" should return pointer to QAbstractItemModel, representing header structure, for horizontal header it uses HorizontalHeaderDataRole, for vertical - VerticalHeaderDataRole. If header's model function "data" with Qt::UserRole return valid QVariant, text in header cell is rotated.
